DbDetails.DbTable: vtigercrm6.vtiger_projectmilestone v left join vtigercrm6.vtiger_projectmilestonetype v0 on v.projectmilestonetype=v0.projectmilestonetypeid left join vtigercrm6.vtiger_users v1 on v.created_by=v1.id left join vtigercrm6.vtiger_users v2 on v.last_update_by=v2.id

DbDetails.queryFormat: SELECT v.projectmilestonename,v0.projectmilestonetype projectmilestonetype,v.projectmilestonedate,GROUP_CONCAT(a.description SEPARATOR ';') progress_memo,v.reviewed,v.review_memo,v.project_ms_idx,v1.user_name created_by,v.creation_date,v2.user_name last_update_by,v.last_update_date,v.projectid,v.projectmilestoneid,vm.projectmilestoneid vmxid,v.reviewed_date,v.reviewed_by FROM vtigercrm6.vtiger_projectmilestone v LEFT JOIN vtigercrm6.vtiger_projectmilestonetype v0 ON v.projectmilestonetype=v0.projectmilestonetypeid LEFT JOIN vtigercrm6.vtiger_users v1 ON v.created_by=v1.id LEFT JOIN vtigercrm6.vtiger_users v2 ON v.last_update_by=v2.id LEFT JOIN vtigercrm6.attachment a ON a.reftbl='vtiger_projectmilestone' AND a.refid=v.projectmilestoneid LEFT JOIN vtigercrm6.vtiger_projectmilestone vm ON vm.projectid=v.projectid AND vm.project_ms_idx<v.project_ms_idx AND !vm.reviewed %{where} GROUP BY v.projectmilestoneid limit %{StartRow},%{PgSize}
